name: X-Road Portal MISP2
description: MISP2 portal can be used for consuming X-Road services both for production environments and testing of services.
requirements: Ubuntu Server 14.04 LTS, 64 bit; X-Road v5/v6; Java 6, PostgreSQL 8.4.

name: X-Road WSDL validator
description: WSDL validator can be used by developers to validate X-Road service WSDL. Validator is also used by Security Server to validate service WSDL.
developer: RIA. (Apache CXF Community; X-Road specific additions by Actors OÜ https://www.aktors.ee/)
requirements: Apache CXF 3.0.1, Linux (Debian), Windows, Java JRE 6+
